'''Good Night, Liyue''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jade Moon Upon a Sea of Clouds]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 25]].

==Trivia==
* ''Good Night, Liyue'' was featured in the rhythm game-based event [[Tuned to the World's Sounds]] from [[Version 2.2]]. During the event, the player is paired with the character [[Ningguang]] for this song.
